translation.en: I'm never like that. [sniffles]

translation.en: I know.
translation.ja: あのさ

translation.en: It's just kinda a thing I do with people.
translation.ja: 俺にはそんな力がある

translation.en: Maybe it was just what you needed.
translation.ja: お前はそれを求めてたのかも

translation.en: What do you need?
translation.ja: お前は何を？

translation.en: [in English] I don't know what that means.
translation.ja: どういう意味？

translation.en: Can I kiss you?
translation.ja: キスしていい？

translation.en: See you next time?
translation.ja: また次回

translation.en: [Payton] Excuse me. Languages?
translation.ja: 言語コーナーは？

translation.en: -[woman] Third stack. -[Payton] Thank you.

translation.en: I'm gonna dive right in.

translation.en: I know what's going on between you and River. He told me what happened.

translation.en: I was mad at first, but then I admired his honesty. River and I have complete transparency.
translation.ja: 最初は腹が立ったけど リヴァーとは隠し事しないの

translation.en: I've always known he was fluid. I am too, sorta.

translation.en: And if you're the way he deals with that part of himself, that's fine.
translation.ja: 彼の相手があなたでも かまわないけど

translation.en: But I want in too.

translation.en: Come over to my house after school.
translation.ja: 放課後 うちに来て

translation.en: Let’s all get it on.

translation.en: Okay.

translation.en: I don't know where the gun came from. Um...
translation.ja: 銃の出どころは知らない

translation.en: I need you to focus and tell me everything you remember.

translation.en: What happened?

translation.en: He killed himself.

translation.en: He did this because of you.

translation.ja: 失礼 会わせて

translation.en: -Sorry, you can’t-- -I have to see him! I’m his girlfriend.
translation.ja: ガールフレンドなの 会わせてよ！

translation.en: I'm his girlfriend!
translation.ja: 私が恋人よ！

translation.en: I should be crying.
translation.ja: 泣くべきだ

translation.en: Why aren't I crying?
translation.ja: 涙が出ない

translation.en: It's not you. They told me when you were born you didn't even cry.
translation.ja: あなたは生まれた時も 泣かずに―

translation.en: You just came out and looked at everyone with a furrowed brow.

translation.en: I’m worried... that I...
translation.ja: 自分が心配なんだ

translation.en: that I don't have the same feelings everyone else does.
translation.ja: 人の持つ感情が欠けてる

translation.en: I think a lot of young people feel that way, especially nowadays.
translation.ja: 昨今の若者は みんな そう感じてると思う

translation.en: Your generation got the terrible idea
translation.ja: あなたの世代は―

translation.en: that it was best to vomit every thought and feeling all over each other.
translation.ja: 思ってることを吐き出し 互いに非難し合うわ

translation.en: It's a pandemic of overcommunication that's led to an absence of intimacy.
translation.ja: やりすぎると 親しくなれなくなるの

translation.en: It's more than that for me.
translation.ja: それだけじゃない

translation.en: What if I'm just wired differently?
translation.ja: 俺は人と違うのかも

translation.en: I mean, what if I can't feel for anyone else?

translation.en: They say that sociopaths can't do that.

translation.en: What if all I'll ever able to do is pretend to feel?

translation.en: Does it matter if you can’t tell the difference?
translation.ja: 違いが分からないことが 問題？

translation.en: He was a wonderful boy.

translation.en: -Seriously? -I can't believe you just said that.

translation.en: Sorry, but it's my job.

translation.ja: やらなくてもいい

translation.en: I want to.
translation.ja: やりたい

translation.en: [woman] And while they ask that you respect their privacy at this time,

translation.en: River's family wishes to express their gratitude

translation.en: for the outpouring of support they have received in the last few days.
translation.ja: 寄せられたお悔やみに 感謝を述べておられます

translation.en: It's trying times like these where we, as a community, look to our student leaders
translation.ja: こういう時期こそ 学生たちが率先し

translation.en: for a way to move forward and begin to heal.
translation.ja: 前を向いて進むことを 期待します

translation.en: Payton?

translation.ja: リヴァーとは 去年 知り合った

translation.ja: 家庭教師だったのが

translation.en: Then he became my friend. And then, my opponent.
translation.ja: その後 友達にも 競争相手にもなった

translation.en: We found ourselves running against one another, but River never made it feel like a competition.

translation.en: Now, the best man can't win.
translation.ja: それは不可能に

translation.ja: 演劇科の友人に―

translation.en: so I've asked one of his many friends to help me sing a song in his honor.

translation.en: Thank you, Payton, that was beautiful. I’m sure River would've appreciated it.

translation.en: You were right when you said the best man can't win.

translation.en: -My running mate will be Skye Leighton. -[applause]

translation.en: We will try to be the first all-female ticket in this school's history.

translation.en: good, because so did I.

translation.en: then together, we can keep River's memory alive.

translation.en: [sighs] Sweetheart.

translation.en: A lifetime of focus and planning, carefully studying applications obtained on the black market
translation.ja: ずっと綿密に計画して いろんな願書を研究し

translation.en: to pinpoint the exact combination of extracurriculars and test scores that would optimize my chances at acceptance.
translation.ja: 課外学習と試験の点数を 合格するよう最適化したのに

translation.en: Three years on that stupid literary magazine. Model UN.

translation.en: -They haven't said no. -This is worse. This is worse than no.

translation.en: No, I can't get in that way. People know it. It stays with you.

translation.en: Come here.

translation.en: Don't litter.

translation.en: Okay.

translation.en: Waitlisted is not "no" and you're going to get in.

translation.en: You're the most exceptional human being I've ever met.

translation.en: Hold on. You must've gotten your letter today too.

translation.en: I'm sure that they have an algorithm that demands they take so many women and so many applicants from this group or that.

translation.en: Yes, I got in.

translation.en: Alice, please, don't diminish your accomplishments to soothe my ego.

translation.en: You're gonna be valedictorian.

translation.en: You have a gold medal in fencing from the Junior Olympics. You speak six languages.
translation.ja: フェンシングで優勝だし ６か国語を話す

translation.en: No one deserves to go to Harvard more than you.

translation.en: -And I am so happy for you. -[giggles]

translation.en: Tonight is about getting you back on your feet 100%,

translation.en: so you can win this election and make this world a better place.

translation.en: Thomas, please go set up your table in the massage room. You'll give Payton a treatment as soon as we're done.
translation.ja: トーマス　マッサージを ペイトンにお願いね

translation.en: Reiki, cups, and acupuncture.
translation.ja: レイキ　カップ　鍼灸(しんきゅう)

translation.en: -You're too good to be true. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: 夢のような人だ

translation.en: I have a plan to help you win.
translation.ja: 勝つ計画があるの

translation.en: But first, I need to ask you some questions, and I need you to answer me honestly, no judgment.
translation.ja: でも まず質問がある 正直に答えてほしいの

translation.en: I swear.
translation.ja: 約束する

translation.en: Did you kill River?
translation.ja: 彼を殺した？

translation.en: I won't judge you or turn you in. I just want to know.
translation.ja: 批判や通報はしないけど 知っておきたいの

translation.en: While you didn't anticipate Astrid jumping into the campaign,
translation.ja: アストリッドが出馬したけど

translation.en: you might have correctly thought that River dying would be your clearest path to victory.
translation.ja: リヴァーが死ねば 勝てると思った？

translation.en: I didn't kill him.
translation.ja: 殺してない

translation.en: We need to break up.
translation.ja: 別れよう

translation.en: -You said you wouldn't judge me! -Not really break up.
translation.ja: なんでだ！ 当選のために 別れたふりをするだけよ

translation.en: We need to pretend to break up in order for you to win the election.
translation.ja: 当選のために 別れたふりをするだけよ

translation.en: Right now, you and Astrid are splitting the sympathy vote.
translation.ja: 今の同情票は五分五分

translation.en: I'm going to confess that I cheated on you.
translation.ja: 私が浮気したと自白すれば

translation.en: It'll be a scandal.
translation.ja: 大騒ぎになる

translation.en: You will dump me and everyone will feel sorry for you.
translation.ja: 私を捨てれば 皆が同情するわ

translation.en: I've cleared with McAfee and James. They think it could gain you six to nine points,
translation.ja: マカフィーたちも了承 ６〜９点 稼げる

translation.en: depending on how magnanimous you are about the whole thing.
translation.ja: 寛大さによってね

translation.en: But everyone will hate you.
translation.ja: でも君が嫌われる

translation.en: I love you.
translation.ja: 愛してる

translation.en: This... is what love looks like, Payton.
translation.ja: これが愛というものよ ペイトン

translation.en: This is what sacrifice looks like.
translation.ja: これが犠牲なの

translation.en: This is what it takes to change the world.
translation.ja: 世界を変えるのに必要なの

translation.en: I am your first lady today...
translation.ja: 私はファーストレディー

translation.en: and always.
translation.ja: ずっとね

translation.en: -But there are rules. -Rules?
translation.ja: でもルールがある ルール？

translation.en: We will break up

translation.en: long enough for you to win and for no one to suspect duplicity on our parts.

translation.en: You will post photos of Big Sur,
translation.ja: 海岸沿いの写真や―

translation.en: the truffle french fries at Hoagies Diner on Route 14,
translation.ja: ルート14の食堂の ポテトフライ

translation.en: and cute dogs on your Instagram at least once a day with captions like,

translation.en: "Wish I was here," and "Yummy," and "heart emoji."
translation.ja: “懐かしい” “おいしい”と ハート付きで書いて

translation.en: When you do so, I will know you were thinking of me.
translation.ja: それで私を想ってると 分かるわ

translation.en: A secret code. I love it.
translation.ja: 秘密の暗号か

translation.en: And, most importantly,
translation.ja: それと一番 大事なのはね

translation.en: when you pass me in the hall, you will not pay me any mind.
translation.ja: 廊下ですれ違う時は 私を見ないこと

translation.en: But as soon as we're past each other, you will turn and look back.
translation.ja: でも すれ違った直後に 振り返って

translation.en: I need you to do this for me or I won't be able to survive.
translation.ja: そうしてくれなければ 私は続かない

translation.en: Do you agree to these terms?
translation.ja: 条件をのむ？

translation.en: You are the best thing that will ever happen to me.
translation.ja: 人生で君が何より大切だ

translation.en: Yes.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: I agree.
translation.ja: のむよ

translation.en: Let's move on to fish course.
translation.ja: 次は魚料理ね

translation.en: I don't want to say "I'm overwhelmed with shame."
translation.ja: 反省してると言いたくない

translation.en: -That's too calculating, it sounds fake. -It is fake.
translation.ja: ウソっぽいわ ウソだ

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: 違う

translation.en: [typing] "I broke up with Payton tonight.
translation.ja: “ペイトンと別れた”

translation.en: I guess you could say I cheated on him, though it's more complicated than that.
translation.ja: “私が浮気したけど もっと複雑なの”

translation.en: That's good. Mysterious. Really makes you lean in.

translation.en: Post it.

translation.en: Jesus, people are freakin' animals. These comments are brutal.

translation.en: I didn't like doing that.

translation.en: I know.

translation.en: It's the right thing to do.
translation.ja: 正しいことだ

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.ja: かわいそうに

translation.en: [man] Payton.

translation.en: Hey, kiddo.
translation.ja: よう

translation.en: Look, I know you've been struggling with Mandarin and River was tutoring you.
translation.ja: 中国語をリヴァーから 学んでたし

translation.en: [sighs] You must be going through a lot right now.
translation.ja: 今 大変な時期だろ

translation.en: Yeah, I am.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: Just show up for the exams, and I'll give you an A.
translation.ja: 試験は出席すれば Ａをあげよう

translation.en: Okay?
translation.ja: いいな？

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: Hey, man, I'm really sorry.
translation.ja: 元気 出せよ

translation.en: [whispers] Numbers look great. Genius. Wish I'd thought of it.
translation.ja: 数字がいい　大成功だ

translation.en: Go to the cafeteria and press some flesh.
translation.ja: 食堂で握手してこい

translation.en: Well, I can imagine.
translation.ja: それはそうよね

translation.en: Well, well, well. Oh.
translation.ja: あら まあ

translation.en: Look who's home. [chuckles]
translation.ja: おかえり

translation.en: Ms. Fancypants, shut the door.
translation.ja: ドアを閉めなさい

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: -Sit down. -Yes, ma'am.
translation.ja: 座って はい

translation.en: [sighs] This lovely young man was telling me
translation.ja: この好青年から聞いたわ

translation.en: that you turned him down again as a running mate in the school election.
translation.ja: また生徒会の副会長を 断ったんだって？

translation.en: That is twice now that you have defied me and I would like an explanation.
translation.ja: 私に２度も逆らったから 説明してくれる？

translation.en: I just don't want all that attention.
translation.ja: 注目されたくない

translation.en: Oh, don't you lie to me.
